Text: Thank you from SiteHeres for your thoughtsWhat results Thank you for such an overwhelming response to our survey We cant wait to dive in and learn how to provide you with even better opportunities for spontaneous escape and entertainment And dive in we mustyour responses were more generous than we had even dared to hopewe have oceans of insight here and we owe it all to you As a token of our appreciation please take off your next Site Getaway purchase At check out just input promo code SURVEY click Update Price and then GO Thanks again and remember if you ever have any suggestions or comments for us in the future please let us know at We remain Your source for spontaneous escape and entertainment The Site Team co Patty Promotion code is valid through October
